amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 6 which requires the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a single multi-sale environmental impact statement for all of the new areas opened for drilling by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 112-616 to strike the provision that requires the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a single multi-sale environmental impact statement for all of the new areas opened for drilling by the underlying bill.
